metadata.name: Oba and His Iloi
metadata.description:
This is the Duo Art of the Oba (King) of Benin City and His Queen (Iloi). This Art means a lot regarding power, unity, love and strength in the community. It was tough for the colonial masters to take over the city because of it unity and strength. This Art is valuable anywhere at anytime and first of it kind in this digital world.

This is a calved sculpture art made from one of African favorites wood as an Analog Art then brought into the digital realm which makes it unique and a special value item for anyone that owns it.
